ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Dumb questions.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yep! It does say that but the criiter isn t where it s supposed to be. I think the problem is with the overhauling of the Luclin server. Many older quests
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:02 AM 11/30/2006 +1100, you wrote:

>Many thanks.
>Dumb question number 2 :)
>I've been looking for a Twisted Ajrah Treant in East Karana for a
>month and I've never see it. I need the special item that only that
>critter carries to complete a quest. Does it appear at a certain time
>of day on a certain day of the week realtime or something?
>
>Check out the Beastiary at
><http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/>http://eqbeastiary.allakhazam.com/
>
>It says:
>
>Head to Eastern Karana and look for Twisted Ajrah Treant, a 20th level
>druid or so, at around -1395, +1125. Kill it (no faction hits) and loot an
>Ajrah Leaf. Bring this back to Allix.
>

Yep! It does say that but the criiter isn't where it's supposed to be. I
think the problem is with the overhauling of the Luclin server. Many older
quests are no longer active. The programmers are focusing their efforts on
installing the new ones. It's sort of like city road work. All you can do
is wait and watch until the streets are fixed. G.

Edward Fox
